headline: Key Reasons to Add Iron Mountain Stock to Your Portfolio Now
summary: IRM's steady storage cash flows, fast-growing data center business and rising FFO estimates point to more upside ahead.

headline: Why Renewed Analyst Optimism on Data Centers Matters for Iron Mountain’s (IRM) Hybrid REIT Narrative
summary: In recent days, Iron Mountain has drawn attention as analysts reiterated positive views on the company while highlighting its data center monetization opportunities and role within the real estate investment trust group. This reinforces Iron Mountain’s positioning as a hybrid physical–digital infrastructure provider benefiting from demand for secure information management and digital infrastructure services. We’ll now explore how renewed analyst optimism around Iron Mountain’s data center...

headline: What You Need to Know Ahead of Iron Mountain's Earnings Release
summary: Iron Mountain is ready to announce its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings soon, and analysts project a robust triple-digit FFO rise.

headline: Assessing Iron Mountain (IRM) Valuation As Analyst Interest And Data Center Prospects Grow
summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) is back on investor radar as analysts highlight its valuation and data center monetization prospects, alongside sector wide outlook shifts that have kept attention on real estate investment trusts. See our latest analysis for Iron Mountain. The recent analyst focus and sector wide re-rating of real estate investment trusts comes after a mixed year for Iron Mountain, with a 30 day share price return of 11.04% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 10.68%, while...
